review_body: Forcing ‚ÄúContinue in Watch‚Äù is a very bad move My two stars from the other week in regards to my saved items automatically being saved to a folder when they aren‚Äôt supposed to is now down to one star due to the newest excuse for an update. In the past I would be watching something and if I clicked on it to watch it bigger it would then show other suggested videos from Watch under it. That was fine. But now I will only be a few seconds into a video on my feed without touching it yet and it will COMPLETELY STOP the video and te me to continue watching  it on Watch. HOWEVER when I try to click the video to make it bigger and thus open it in Watch it won‚Äôt do jack squat. This tells me I would have to click over to Watch and then attempt to refind the video just to bloody watch it in the first place. I don‚Äôt know who was smoking the stupid juice this time, but I would rather watch no videos than have to go out of my way to hunt a video down just to watch after it‚Äôs already been presented in front of me. And as someone with a business page that posts videos (AND PAYS GOOD MONEY to use some as ads) it makes me want to cut back what I spend with you all if this is what my users will be left with. Please please PLEASE change it back.

Buggiest app on my iPad Let‚Äôs face it, if you use social media Facebook is a must have to stay connected.  However the Facebook app is a complete bug filled app that only seems to break more with every update.  I‚Äôve been waiting for years for it to work right and yet I always know when an update comes, because something you use regularly will break guaranteed.  If by some miracle it gets fixed in the bi-weekly update, I promise you something else you use will be hindered in the next version.

Locked Out of Account If I could give 0 Stars, I would.. Facebook has locked me out of my account for days, saying they need to review a photo of me. There is no one to contact or email to fix it. I have had my account since about 2005 so it doesn‚Äôt make sense.. The Help Page is of no help because it consists of regular people who do not have access to unlock accounts. Facebook needs to have a direct contact via Chat or email to assist their customers.

Attn: FB suspended my account for no solid reason suddenly Greetings Facebook crew! The purpose I write to you is none other than to impart my report as well as to acquire assistance pertaining to Facebook account service. So today all of a sudden Facebook is asking me to submit a photo ID upon logging in; and I have uploaded and sent a photo of my driving license (genuine!). I have been using Facebook since 2009 if my memory serves me well and I never did infringe your ToU or regulations but somehow you team got me as using a fake profile name? I believe someone from within my friend list or a page (I don‚Äôt know as I followed/Liked tons of pages) was behaving mischievously and made a false accusation or report over my profile for no solid reason. What‚Äôs more, I did not do anything wrong ever since I use Facebook, or use the service for illegal purposes. Pretty please review my account suspension that does not hold water and reinstate it in next to no time. Please reach out to me please. It is the quarantine period and I need to work from home. Not to mention I have other foreign accounts that I link FB to login with. Thank you for your concern. Why do I have to bear a fault that is not mine?

Ok app, people you may know feature is annoying The app is ok to deal with but the people you may know feature is completely annoying and frustrating. I must say it‚Äôs a nice feature but it gets frustrating when you remove people and the next day or a few days later they show up again as people you may know. Facebook needs to add a delete button for that and not just the remove button or the remove button should remove that person and their profile permanently because hitting the remove button only brings that person profile back up within a day or a few days. I‚Äôm completely irritated with it because if I hit the remove bottom it‚Äôs because I don‚Äôt know that person, I don‚Äôt want to know that person, or don‚Äôt want to be friends with that person. I shouldn‚Äôt have to spend so much time ‚Äúremoving‚Äù but not permanently removing people from the ‚Äúpeople you may know‚Äù only for them to pop back up as people I may know 24-48hrs later!! IT‚ÄôS ANNOYING. STOP IT FACEBOOK LET ME PERMANENTLY REMOVE PEOPLE I DON‚ÄôT KNOW AND/OR DON‚ÄôT WANT TO KNOW OR BE BOTHERED WITH WITHOUT HAVING THEM POP UP AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN. REVAMP THE ‚ÄúPEOPLE YOU MAY KNOW‚Äù FEATURE SO THAT IT CAN BE BETTER MANAGED BY US!! Thanks üò§üò§

Issues that need fixing There are several things that are frustrating.  1- if I mark See posts first, that means I want to see this persons posts first ‚Äî NOT three days later, and not after seeing countless posts from people not marked See first. See first means see first.  2 - when I scroll through my newsfeed I doesn‚Äôt want it to stop after 3 or 4 posts.  I want it to keep scrolling.  When I‚Äôve seen enough I will quit. If I delete the app it and reinstall, it will work for awhile but will behave the same way again soon.  3-  if I see a post on my Facebook iPad app, I should be able to also see it on my iPhone Facebook app.  Why aren‚Äôt these two newsfeeds consistent? 4 - if I have a custom list or a smart list, why can‚Äôt I click on that list and see posts from just those people?  5- if there are birthdays or events that show up in the right hand column, I don‚Äôt want to see the word DONE, I want to see the event or birthday.  Again, I can get this to work again if I delete and reinstall the app. Perhaps rather than working on enhancements the developers just need to fix the bugs, and then be sure future bug fixes don‚Äôt break things again.

New update causing newsfeed to freeze Didn‚Äôt have this problem until yesterday when the new update kicked in. Everything else works fine, notifications, clicking through group posts and whatnot. But as soon as I go to news feed before or after doing other things on the app it just freezes. I‚Äôve reset the app, I‚Äôve reset my phone, I‚Äôve cleared all of Facebook‚Äôs caches, and I‚Äôm going to try uninstalling and reinstalling next.

WHAT IS GOING ON??? A couple of my posts are being removed as going against Community Standards regarding spam. One was an historical article entitled ‚ÄúCoronasvirus and the Sun: a Lesson from the 1918 Influenza Pandemic‚Äù (I posted one and the other that appears on my timeline I was tagged in) The other post that was removed as spam was regarding digitized artwork from Paris museums entitled ‚ÄúParis Museums Put 100,000 Images Online for Unrestricted Public Use‚Äù. In this case I did post both, the first time was March 4th, the second time was March 16 with a title that suggested a wonderful way to view the art work - by streaming the site. A form of entertainment that is both beautiful and educational. I would not be writing this here except for the fact that there is no longer a place on the app under Help and Support were I could pose questions or defend my posts. I was also unable to find FB‚Äôs definition of spam. Did I miss something or miss an update? I do try to update regularly. Or perhaps the most recent update for my phone, needs to get some more bugs worked out and improvements made.

Terrible app, terrible website I hate Facebook. There's more things than I want to even write out. The security/customer service is pure garbage. Why? Because they don't have customer service! My Instagram (of course Facebook owns Instagram) got hacked and the situation was so complex that there was no way the automated response service could help with it. Come to find out there's no live customer support... Honestly, how is that even legal???? Does it even matter how many accounts there are on Instagram? It's not like Mark Zuckerberg and Co have no money to hire people or something? I don't know maybe I'm just crazy. Because I thought they were pretty rich.

Someone LIED to you Whomever told you this latest update was a great idea, SHOULD BE FIRED. 1)When notifications come in that I‚Äôve been tagged or someone has replied to a comment I made, it no longer takes you to the post, just to the comment. So if I commented last week and I get a reply today I have absolutely no idea what the original post was about. 2) A notification disappears after I look at it. So if I have to refer back to it for any reason, I have to somehow find the page of the original poster and then hunt for the post. STUPID IDEA 3) When going to some notifications, when you click on it it takes you to a blank post. I see the persons name, the time they posted and maybe if someone reacted to it, but absolutely no post at all. There‚Äôs even comments on it but I see no post at all. Yes I have access to  their page, I haven‚Äôt been blocked and they call me to say ‚Äúdid you see my last post‚Äù and all I see is nothing.

Shutting down I don't know why but lately Facebook app has been shutting down and going to my main screen while I'm reading somethingüò°very annoying!!! Fix this bug please! It also refreshes on its own. That's really annoying too when you are going through comments and then back out wanting to continue where you were before going to the comments and it decides on its own "nope you were done scrolling" üôÑ

Irritating App The app has been driving me crazy for months now. If I stay on the Facebook page, it only blacks out once or twice per evening. If I want to read something (my cousin's newspaper article, for instance) posted by my friends, the app blacks out every time and if I want to continue on Facebook, I have to open the app all over again and hope I can find my place. I'm almost ready to delete the darn thing!  Wondering if it's worth the frustration! I've written my problems to the staff through Facebook three times and have received no recommendations. Can the app be fixed?

Enough with refreshing the newsfeed! I never write reviews, but these recent updates make me want to delete Facebook. 6 months ago, if I needed to pause my Facebook scrolling go do something else, I would just click someone‚Äôs picture and it would ‚Äúhold my place‚Äù in my newsfeed. This was great. I‚Äôm a mom to a toddler and I oftentimes have to multitask. NOW, if I switch to a different app or put my phone down for 10 SECONDS to do something else, my newsfeed refreshes, and starts at the top. This is infuriating when I‚Äôm in the middle of reading an article or looking at an album of pictures. What is the purpose of this? Who is it benefitting? Certainly not your users. I find myself getting on Facebook less and less these past few weeks because I get more annoyance than enjoyment out of it. Do you not do any kind of market research before you implement these things? And please, get rid of the camera. Everyone and their brother has a camera on their phone. I think we‚Äôre set! I‚Äôm tired of swiping left to exit a post and accidentally hitting the camera which takes 10 seconds to load.  I can‚Äôt imagine what your UI/QA teams get paid to ‚Äúok‚Äù these poorly planned ‚Äúenhancements‚Äù.

Facebook Messenger Please find a way not to show all your friends when you‚Äôre on FB. I sometimes like to zone out on FB just to pass the night. It is very very annoying to receive pop-ups in the wee small hours of the night from people (most often men) whom I barely know. There are no boundaries on Messenger. What I mean by this is that anyone can Message or even call anyone else whether they are friends or not. I have been harassed and annoyed in this manner also by a man who was drunk and didn‚Äôt want to take no for an answer in the middle of the night, calling on Messenger over and over again. I had to threaten to call police. How did he know I was awake and alone? Messenger!  It can also bring up trust issues with people in relationships who don‚Äôt know if their significant other is live chatting with a side piece or playing FarmVille in the wee small hours of the night. I‚Äôm a private person who likes to keep my business to myself. Find a way, please, to let the user decide whether or not they want to let anyone or no one pop up and interrupt their lives with Messenger. I regularly install and then uninstall, when it could just be so easy to fix it. Please do.

No notifications about my posts! For the last 2 months, the notification settings in the app are a complete mess.  The app will have the red number, but one of them are about my own posts. Any reactions or comments to MY posts don‚Äôt load in the list of notifications, so I have no idea about comments or reactions unless I actually go to the post itself.  All I see are notifications about my friends‚Äô posts.  Further, while the news feed works fine, the list of notifications is limited to EXACTLY 20 notifications.  When I scroll to the bottom, the page just jumps and doesn‚Äôt refresh to show any more than exactly 20.  Maybe once a week I will scroll and be surprised to be able to scroll past 20, but it‚Äôs not because of anything I did or didn‚Äôt do.  AND once I scroll back to the top of the list and scroll back down, I‚Äôm limited to 20 again.   AND notifications for my posts still aren‚Äôt in the list.  I have a brand new iPhone 6s Plus (3 months), so if Facebook doesn‚Äôt fix it soon, I am going to be convinced that the problems are a way to push people to upgrade their phones to the newest versions.

If it isn‚Äôt broken, don‚Äôt fix it Nobody wants a game page or a group page. It‚Äôs amazing how many different ways you want to send me push notifications, that I literally only click on so that it will go away. I went in to change my notification settings and it turns out you will not let me turn off all group notifications at once and I have to go through a list and manually select out of 100 groups which ones I want, the slider for all is greyed out. This is totally unnecessary, and nobody asked for this. Why do I have a notification for every time someone goes live? Anytime an event is added at a venue I checked into ONE TIME that‚Äôs across the world in a different country? Facebook notifications used to notify me when someone wanted to talk to me, and I‚Äôve done my best to continually update my setting but it‚Äôs getting crazy. Now I‚Äôll have 7 notifications and check it and not a single one is about a friend I have that was reaching out to me. Events, game page, so and so went live, so and so checked in safe, I have memories from 10 years ago to look at, so and so posted in this group, like I do. Not. Care. And I don‚Äôt need a red push notification making it seem like I should.

Following the prompts doesn‚Äôt work at all I have follow all the necessary prompts that i am suppose to take and every since i got my new phone but it won‚Äôt let me get back into the app at all when i have repeatedly taken four selfies on yesterday with me whole up different numbers and i have taken some other selfies with me whole up different other numbers today as well but by me repeatedly doing this i am putting myself at risk repeatedly doing the same thing over and over again and if you are a new user to Facebook don‚Äôt trust it if you get log out and can‚Äôt get back in because you switch mobile companies and you don‚Äôt have your old phone number or old mobile phone and if you more than Facebook post they won‚Äôt take that down neither once putting you at risk for hackers so if you are a new Facebook user don‚Äôt trust it if don‚Äôt be put at risk for haveing more than one Facebook page and post i will not give Facebook any type of ratings for haveing my identity expose in a manner in which i just stated in this paragraph it‚Äôs wrong and will be getting in touching with the Federal Trade commission center since i no way to deactivate all my pages and post.

It‚Äôs good. Not perfect, but good enough. Just be smart and don‚Äôt click on random links, don‚Äôt give away your password to anybody, don‚Äôt accept suspicious links even from your friends unless it‚Äôs 100% sure that it‚Äôs your friend who messaged you. There are many cases that people are ‚Äúhacked‚Äù, when in reality they just gave away their password. I‚Äôve been using the Internet since I was in 3rd grade and i‚Äôve never been hacked. I‚Äôm in college now!

Little details make a big difference Here recently videos have started displaying this keep watching button right in the middle of the video. If I‚Äôm just scrolling through my newsfeed and want to watch a video in it‚Äôs entirety then I should be able to do that!! Not only that but then I also have to deal with the ads in the video too! It‚Äôs frustrating and makes the app not very enjoyable to use! Also, the back/forward arrows on a webpage need to be put back where they were at the bottom of the page. It‚Äôs too easy now to hit the X button to close a webpage when all I really wanted to do was go back a page. Very frustrating when you‚Äôve been looking at something for a long time only for it to close and then the newsfeed refreshes and you‚Äôve lost the link you were looking at originally. None of the other apps (Pinterest, Instagram) do this. Their back/forward buttons are at the bottom of the screen, away from the ‚ÄúX‚Äù button so you don‚Äôt risk closing your page. It‚Äôs little thing like this that make or break an app. And right now Facebook, you‚Äôre on the verge of falling apart.
Seriously? Okay so well I love the app. I get to talk to my family and join groups specifically the ones about animals and anime‚Äôs I like/have.

Nothing loads anymore... When I open the app I can only see a handful of posts from days ago. When I scroll to the bottom, the app doesn‚Äôt load any more posts. Refreshing does nothing. I don‚Äôt get any error messages. On the posts that do show up: 1. comments don‚Äôt load at all 2. videos freeze after max 10-15 seconds 3. when I react to or comment on something it never actually posts it; next time I load the app and see the post I commented on, my both my comment & reaction don‚Äôt show up.

Nothing loads anymore I‚Äôve been a faithful Facebook user for years. It is my go to social media platform and I love it. However for the last couple months I‚Äôve noticed it won‚Äôt load random things. Images, comments, and video will stop loading if I‚Äôve been scrolling for a minute or two. Sometimes I‚Äôll be just hopping on and comments won‚Äôt load for something. It doesn‚Äôt matter if I‚Äôm on WiFi or data. I‚Äôve even gone as far as to uninstall it and reinstall it twice this week, which worked for that night and stopped the next day. I never used to have this problem until after I got the iPhone X. My husband just switched phones to the iPhone X like me (got mine on Mother‚Äôs Day) and now he experiences it too, and we have friends who say they noticed it as well on this phone but when they switched phones, it was all good. Is there possibly a compatibility flaw between Facebook and the new iPhone? I hate not being able to use it like I used to. Hopefully this can be fixed so we can keep using it.

Most frustrating app ever I have been a holdout since Facebook started. I finally gave in so I could see what was going on with family.  This has been the most stressful annoying experience ever.  No tech support while developer Mark is a billionaire.   I also several times a week only have about 6 items and the feed ends.  Log out and back in. Did setting for a couple people to be on the top of my feed.  Never are.  My daughter is trying to Like things and gets a ‚Äòthis action is blocked ‚Äò reply and tells it 20 times that it‚Äôs a mistake and then it happens again.  Then it locked her account.   Then you have to identify 5 people who are friends to convince FB that you are still really you.  Then she had to change password two different times in two days and she‚Äôs an expert at this app.  Ruining my vacation trying to post our things and encounter glitch after glitch.  Oh log out AGAIN!!!! Try AGAIN!!   By the volume of all these crappy reviews I would think the boss would want to fix these bugs and actually be an above standard app.   Guess you don‚Äôt care anymore once you get really rich.   Hate this app.

Unwanted sounds. Huge unusable app. I kept hoping Facebook would stop switching in app sounds back on and that they would also do away with trying to force me to create a passcode, but the undoing of my preferences by the app has become relentless. I have to switch off the app sounds daily. It‚Äôs obnoxious! I never wanted them in the first place. How many times will I have to inform the app that I want the sounds shut off for good? It is unpleasant to hear cheesy clicking and clacking sounds as you simply move from post to post on Facebook. Horrible idea.

Not worth it, borderline violates freedom of speech They‚Äôre run almost completely by bots it seems and you can be banned from posting for the most ridiculous things. Wasn‚Äôt like this before, but either they‚Äôre under new management or their bots are now hypersensitive. I didn‚Äôt even get told what I did wrong, only that I posted something offensive in one of the many groups I‚Äôm in (I‚Äôm in a group for people to share offensive opinions, so yeah I‚Äôm going to post something there that may be construed that way because that is what that group is for!) and that I‚Äôm blocked from posting until April 1. April 1 came and I tested it out, still blocked until 8:22 the morning they said. It‚Äôs 8:58 now and I‚Äôm still blocked, but no explanation this time. I‚Äôve had posts taken down before that don‚Äôt break any laws or advocate breaking any laws, but are simply funny memes that I share to specific groups so I don‚Äôt offend anyone who is outside of that group and not wanting to see it. Even been banned just for posting my opinions, no threats, no attacking people, just operating my right to freedom of speech! They shouldn‚Äôt call themselves a public platform if they can‚Äôt uphold the rights of the public.

Buggy in the app, buggy in the browser, just can‚Äôt win. I use my iPad exclusively for managing a business page on facebook. IT IS INFURIATING. Nothing works properly. The app skips around, comments don‚Äôt post occasionally, and the worst is trying to dig through a whole post to find where someone has tagged me in a comment. For some reason, notifications don‚Äôt bring me to the tag or reply, it just sends me to the general post or group and I have to DIG for it. It‚Äôs a huge waste of my time and a hinderance to my business. Then, in the browser, it inserts double spaces every time I hit the space bar. This is a confirmed Facebook problem, not the fault of Apple, safari, or chrome. It is the same across all browsers. Some have theorized that this is so facebook can force you to use the app, where they have more room for advertising, but THE APP DOESN‚ÄôT WORK EITHER. If I was not dependent on Facebook for my business, I flat out would not use it. It‚Äôs terrible. Terrible platform, terrible apps, terrible algorithm codes. You‚Äôd think a multi million dollar company would at least be competent enough to resolve the double-space issue in the browser. Ridiculous. FIX IT.

Learn How to "Keep it Sold" Updated review Nov 2019. Stop messing up the app. Fix the bugs, but stop tweaking it. Once again, when I go to Groups, I know longer see the Groups I belong to. This feature has gone away before; I reported it and it was restored. Now, after the latest update it‚Äôs gone again.

Um, what?! I have an idea!! Instead of pretending your app is perfect, how about make a place where people can actually report issues with the programming?? Like false information!! If I put someone on ignore and have their messages go into the spam folder, why can they still call me thru messenger?? Why am I getting the notification that they are calling when it clearly states they will NOT be able to call?? Fix that.. Also, I loathe that when I pause a video and put my phone down, the video starts playing again.. That makes absolutely no sense at all.. Why have a pause button?? It seems like the ‚Äúupdates‚Äù that happen every two weeks are just adding more minor inconveniences and prohibiting more and more options, like changing your name.. Also, why are people I have on my blocked list placed on the list of people to share posts with?? I went to share a post on a specific persons page and two people I have on my blocked list were on that list of people to share with.. WHAT?! Makes so sense!! Please fix the real issues and stop adding garbage to the app.. Sound good?? You have the resources, your facility is huge enough..

Worst App ever I am literally hating facebook so much! Every update to ‚Äúmake facebook better‚Äù is a scam! Everything gets changed every 2 week and that‚Äôs not to mention such a trashy algorithm. For starters I am being charged $25 on my new page for ads when I have never run an add on this page. However it still telling me my card is not going trough and I‚Äôm just soo confused as to why am I being charged, thankfully I have never put down my card information. Tried contact them and see why it‚Äôs saying I owe $25 dollar but no response... customer service is just trash and non existent. Every time I upload a video or a prerecorded storie it takes several hours and sometimes days to actually upload ... that‚Äôs ridiculous!!

Updating the App into Uselessness I am a member of a lot of groups and rely on my email notifications to decide which posts to actually read and which to ignore. Unfortunately, FB made that impossible several months ago when, during an update, my email notifications suddenly became two lines instead of the full post. I‚Äôm assuming that was to force me to visit FB more often. What‚Äôs worse, is that in a recent update, when I click on the ‚Äúview on Facebook‚Äù button in the email notification, instead of taking me directly to the post I want to read, FB now takes me to a random video in the FB watch tab. Presumably to get me to watch more videos. But all it‚Äôs doing is frustrating me to no end. Now, the latest, is when I manually try to find the post I want to read by looking at my notifications tab, the post doesn‚Äôt show up until I refresh the group page, which never used to be the case. It is all a downward spiral that makes me wish I could just stop using FB and try something else. Stop updating the app to make it less convenient for users!

Facebook sometimes listens to my cell phone calls A few times I have been talking to friends on my cell phone about a product a friend likes or I like. Minutes later I see ads for the same product. One time a friend said she would like one of those walk in bath tubs because she was afraid of falling. I hung up the phone and checked my Facebook wall only to find an ad for the walk in tubs AND for one of those "I've fallen and I can't get up" services. Facebook searches through my private address book and suggests that I might want to "friend" people they find. There is so much fake news that shows up on my wall. Some of the ads are so obviously fake and they show up everywhere on FB. Ones about alive celebrities where the ad says so and so died and no one knew she died. Others that say things like Joy Behr is quitting the View because she uses a certain face cream. Our president spends all his waking hours lying to the American public. I don't want to be bombarded with more lies. I wish I could trust Facebook. I like being in touch with friends of my choosing. I don't like being manipulated by Facebook. They are very invasive.

Duplicate names and fake accounts First of all this app is good.. but i dont know why i think that i still miss most of my friend‚Äôs post. And about duplicate fake accounts. I think Facebook needs to implement a system that avoids the use of Same names . Because personally i even found one of my photos being uploaded to someone‚Äôs timeline.. Even though that didn‚Äôt annoyed me.. But facebook should provide strong control over the user‚Äôs photo.. so that i wont be downloaded in other devices. Even though some of pic may be screenshot. Facebook should also implement a system like face identifying AI to identify the use of multiple photos of same user over different account. I mean to say to have new kinds of notification and alerts if some . Even if some people decide to make backup account their previously used mobile number to verify, the creation of account of same user allowing to upload the photo signifying its really the same guy...

Privacy Wanted I am a very private individual. I keep my friends list very limited to under 20 people tops (mostly family and not even friends & co-workers) so that I can share video and photos with them about life events. I also post news commentary. I know about the NSA thing with Snowden. This is not what has upset me. Now, Facebook is publicly threatening that instead of just the algorithm and a relatively small team of content curators based out of Facebook's HQ, they are planning to hire an army of up to 20,000 human content police! I have real fears that one of these 20,000 strong may end up being a nosy neighbor down the street. I don't like the idea of having 20,000 people capable of seeing my posts that I don't even know who they are. The NSA is in Maryland, Facebook is in California. I was not worried about people from either of those groups being a neighbor living next door to me that I do not want to have access to my information! I am very weird in what I post (ufo stuff). Im sick of having to worry if my neighbor might happen to be a Facebook mod, like those in the website Nextdoor in which I am constantly tearing up snail mail invites for.
Facebook review customer comments. I am 51 years old I am totally disabled and in a wheelchair and I am on a fixed income as we all of you know, and thanks 4 making it harder now why,because

So many issues with the app 7/3/18 new review: I can‚Äôt go 5 seconds without this app kicking me out of it. Also, what happened to the feature where when you went to post a pic, if you tapped and held the pic you could edit it before posting? Seriously over this app. I‚Äôm about to delete it and just use safari, because it‚Äôs got so many issues and just not worth it anymore. I now have the 8 plus and have had nothing but issues since I updated the other day.

Blacking out of Facebook while trying to access since iOS 11.4 update I‚Äôm reposting as this blacking out of Facebook and/or not being able to get feeds is just maddening, to say the least.  Even after system rebooting and deleting Facebook and reinstalling and working w/Ô£øApple this problem continues, as a matter of fact this post has taken me 3 times in order to complete my typing - please advise!  I‚Äôve even written Facebook but have not gotten a response. üò° Oh and yes it happens on my iPad Pro, so it has to be Facebook after the new iOS update to 11.4.

My account is hacked, FB will not help I have now lost all my FB access as I can not be recognized by email or searching to find my account by name- I have circled for two days the HELP CENTER they tell you is the ONLY MEANS OF SUPPORT as they do not offer ANY SUPPORT whatsoever for this app. I tried notifying them in the beginning my account was being messed with as I had messages being posted through messenger Sending out porn spam to my friends, and then the next morning after hours of trying to loop the useless help info which all circles to the same pages of information that DOES NOT HELP if you have NO access!!!!!!! My account is now inaccessible to me. I HAVE TWOOOOOOOO BUSINESS PAGES linked to this profile which I have NO ACCESS TO anymore and NO HELP! How can FB be a multi billion dollar company and have ‚Äúthe best hackers and technical security‚Äù and yet HAVE NOOOOO AND I MEAN ABSOLUTELY NOOOOOOOOOOOO HELP to recover a hacked account. Hack resulting in loss of view as I‚Äôve been on Facebook since at least 2009. People won‚Äôt get rid of Snapchat because Facebook added stories, so why are you trying to be Snapchat? General Review and Update 194 As a whole I‚Äôve always liked the Facebook app due to easy accessibility and convenience. My issue is that there always seems to be a new issue each update, and sometimes previous issues aren‚Äôt even fixed. This update comes with an issue that won‚Äôt allow the personal timeline to load, amongst other features having slow loading speeds (not related to my speeds on either cellular or Wi-Fi). The app would be a lot better if the Facebook team took the time to fully review all bugs or potential crashes before posting an update. The frequency of updates shows me that they do not seem to fully examine the issues. I hope they will fix this issue, and start paying more attention regarding future issues.

Facebook Jail Hello.   My name is ‚ÄúChattyTracy‚Äù.   I have been reprimanded by Facebook numerous times....the last time they found something I posted objectionable, they took my entire screen name identity out of Facebook.    It seems as though I simply do not exist.      I must mention at this time that I am very pleased Google remembered my identity.    I randomly typed Chatty Tracy in the search bar on Google the other day and I was very pleasantly surprised that my image as well as my Facebook persona appeared.     My rant this morning is that while there are many people who wish to see me succeed, there are just as many or more who want to see me fall flat on my face.    I am actually appalled  at the possibility of having to live through a scenario where I would continue to be placed in situations  where the public judges my motives without knowing my cause.   Good weekend wishes.

Combined with all the stories in the news about the ways in which Facebook is supporting the increasingly authoritarian regime under which we live, I‚Äôm inclined to stop using Facebook altogether.

Found the "Log Out" in new version Of the features I use, the most notable change is the location of the "Log Out" feature. News feed needs work The app now only gives one or two posts on your news feed. Then stops. If you go to most recent post it gives you posts from 3 or 4 days ago. So clogged up with ads that it‚Äôs almost impossible to see your friends posts. Rarely shows today‚Äôs posts but repeatedly shows the same 2 or three posts from past days. If you want to see your friends posts you actually have to go to their page. It used to tell you if they had new posts it no longer even does that. Used to enjoy Facebook but quickly losing interest because of these issues.

New profile So the Facebook profile I had for 9 years got hacked and I tried to change the password to protect myself and my friends and I got completely locked out. I mean to the point that I cannot even find the profile at all. I lost every thing. All my pictures and all my memories just everything! I am completely heart broken. Now I have set up a new profile and I‚Äôm having to start completely over.... I have no marketplace no Facebook tv or videos on my search icons ...nothing... WTH is happening... it makes me not want to be on here at all. is anyone else experiencing these issues or is it just me.

Getting worse I used to like coming on here and checking out my friends and family now all i see are advertisements. I go my interest page and everything on there is nothing I'm interested in I clear it out, and boom you put all kinds of crap back in there. I can‚Äôt disable it or block everything. I continually see the same things over and over again. I don‚Äôt want to see the same post 50 times because people keep commenting on it. I don‚Äôt see things as they are posted.

Conments malfunctioning In addition to the annoyance of the app refreshing when you multitask to another app, and thus losing your place in the newsfeed; the comment part is malfunctioning. More than once since the most recent upgrade on my iPhone running iOS 13, I will be typing a comment when all of a sudden the box goes blank mid-typing and I‚Äôll lose my text altogether.  It‚Äôs very annoying to the point where I will either stop trying to leave helpful comments, or need to type them in a better app so I can copy and paste them into the comment field.

Doesn‚Äôt work well on IPad I‚Äôve recently noticed that I cannot delete my personal posts from my FB wall. I like to clean up my posts monthly by deleting my posts that I don‚Äôt want. Well, when you select the three dots ... within the post a window opens that gives you the option to edit, delete, forward...but when you select ‚Äú delete‚Äù the confirmation window opens but there‚Äôs nothing in it. It‚Äôs completely blank. Any of the other options work, only the delete won‚Äôt work. I‚Äôve notified FB several times but get nothing from them.

Marketplace Crashes I spend most of my Facebook time in Marketplace so I do not know if the problem that I‚Äôm having is systematic of the app or just Marketplace. Anyway, it crashes every few minutes and from what I‚Äôve noticed it only seems to happen when scrolling. I‚Äôve reset my iPad multiple times, I‚Äôve force closed all other open apps, verified that I have plenty of free memory and I‚Äôve even uninstalled the app completely and reinstalled. There have been several updates since this began. Surely I‚Äôm not the only one that has experienced this! It‚Äôs been going on for months now and has become very annoying!

Facebook lacks in customer service help I‚Äôve been trying to get help to get back into my account since April and I‚Äôve done everything possible to try and get the issue resolved. Facebook only replied with a generic reply sent to everyone who messages but there was never a follow through. This has happened multiple times. I need help, tried calling customer service apparently Facebook doesn‚Äôt have one only for marketing? Seriously? Would appreciate a response or a reach out from Facebook to resolve my problem as it‚Äôs also killing by business not being able to reply to my customers.

author_name: Just A Feeling that I have....
review_body: Not worth it anymore.... Facebook has become pointless. While I used to enjoy using it to keep in touch with friends,  now it has became an app for ads, constant product suggestions, a completely screwed up Newsfeed that never loads the most recent posts no matter how many time I choose it, posts that never load or posts of others that I can‚Äôt read, and it shows about three of my friends a week while filling the rest of my feed with 50 posts from the same page I liked in the past. Most of my friends have switched to Instagram. Guess it is time to finally make that switch.

I wish I could give this 0 stars My account was temporarily locked due to security concerns. I‚Äôve had this account for 10 years and have never entered my login and password on another site. I regularly change my password. Now I‚Äôm locked out for days for no reason, and there is no customer service to help me. I went through the Identity Recovery and received a link saying my account was unlocked. No luck.. still locked. It said reply to the message if I had trouble. I‚Äôve sent 8 replies which have all gone unanswered. When I follow their steps to try to login, I get an error saying to try again later.  Beyond frustrating.

Bring back ‚ÄúSent requests‚Äù The app is constantly changing, and that‚Äôs fine, but in the friend request section of the mobile app you used to be able to view ‚Äúsent requests‚Äù and the new update took that away. When y‚Äôall put suggested people on your main page it‚Äôs easy to accidentally click ‚Äúadd friend‚Äù when you didn‚Äôt mean to. Would be nice to see if I accidentally requested someone.

???? So I made a new account, liked some things right away, and Facebook in its infinite wisdom decided that it was suspicious and locked my account. Then they don‚Äôt give any directions on what to do, just ‚Äúgive a photo so we can review it.‚Äù They‚Äôve been reviewing it for ages and aren‚Äôt saying anything. Online sources say the picture has to include some data like birthday and stuff to confirm it. I didn‚Äôt know that so I sent in another picture of my face with nothing. Now I have no idea how to resolve that and I don‚Äôt want to make another email account to make another Facebook account. üòï

It‚Äôs Facebook I love being able to connect with my family members and friends, I hate the adds in the middle of videos. So that takes away a star all by itself. Everything else is fine no complaints here. There‚Äôs nothing super fantastic about it that‚Äôs unique to Facebook ye kinda basic but I mean there‚Äôs nothing horrible about it. Only other thing is I wish I could put the name of my SO in my relationship status, even if he‚Äôs not on Facebook ?

App has been terrible for several months now. With some update in the last couple months, the ability to update my news feed has been so spotty it‚Äôs beyond frustrating. Sometimes I open the app and it‚Äôs says ‚Äúposts can‚Äôt be loaded right now‚Äù. Sometimes only one or two posts from seemingly random friends are visible. Sometimes a whole string of posts from one person or page dating back several days or even weeks is all I can see. I would say about 80% of the time I log into this app, it‚Äôs pretty much useless. I‚Äôm close to deleting it because there is literally no point to it most of the time.

Help My account got disabled because they couldn‚Äôt prove that I was a real person even know half of my family follows me and i have a few pictures I just don‚Äôt have time to be on the app everyday. I have been trying to get my account back but I have gotten no response. I tried to make a new account but Facebook will not let me make one anymore. So if y‚Äôall say this please help me get my account back and if anyone else sees this and knows how to get it back please let me know because this is super frustrating.

Update issues These updates are terrible. Claims it fixes bugs it gives it cockroaches! Nothing works right and badge notifications no longer work on the home screen app. You get sent to a silly page that‚Äôs gives you instructions on stuff that your not even asking about. Or you follow it and it still doesn‚Äôt work!

What Is Going On? Facebook used to not be so glitchy. Every time I go to look at Facebook something happens and nothing works right. I‚Äôll be watching one video and every other video I get shown on my time line will have a screen shot of the previous video. Also when I look at a thread of photos I can‚Äôt look at the end one without it closing out the original thread and going back to my timeline. Facebook, come on now. You‚Äôre better than the garbage app that I and I‚Äôm assuming a lot of other people have now. I‚Äôm about ready to delete and use other platforms.

Ad-free Facebook and Tension Free Use I have been using Facebook actively since 2007.  Now, I am using Facebook casually; which means I log-in once in every two days and check my timeline and then log-off. In fact, I am very concern about my privacy and security as I share my personal info in Facebook. My most loved app has become my most concerned app. I want an ad-free Facebook (if needed a paid version) with highest priority for our data privacy. I want to use Facebook 24/7 without any tension of illegal intrusion by any third party organisation.

Check out I was searching for a check-out section. Now if your able to check-in some where you should be able to check-out that should be an option as well. You can't say I stayed here and not be able to check-out saying you enjoyed this place. Now this may not be a big concern for you but it's an option you should give ppl...

Ui When you guys update the app i see my friends with facebook looking very different from mine üíîüôÅ. I just wanted know if you all could make sure when the app updates regularly that the updates are working for both software and user interface. I get a little jealous when i see my friends messenger look a little different from mines because it looks so cool ! I just want to urge you guys to make sure the updates affect all devices , if possible. Thanks and I hope you guys see this ~

Fb Since the new update fb keeps freezing as I scroll my feed. So absolutely tired of the constant updates that only seem to make the app worse! I‚Äôm sick and tired of it and I‚Äôm adamantly debating deleting my fb all together. On top of the above stated bugs. I‚Äôm also sick and tired of the constant stream of ads paraded across my screen. Videos that stop halfway through to play an ad about a product I have no interest in. And the stupid story feed now. Fb has changed everything it once was, all for profit off of us the users by selling ad time to companies we don‚Äôt want anything to do with. Way to become a bunch of corporate sellouts!

Use of WiFi WiFi should not 'have' to be a requirement, when updating the App. My WiFi is down, and when I tried to update via my phone's service, like I do 99% of my apps, it stayed in a loop, searching for WiFi, and never returned an error message.

Market place on facebook I don't use Facebook muck. Most to see marketplace. Now when I go to marketplace and tap on something to save all is good until I get a message from someone. I can access the message but when I try to view the item, I'm lead off Facebook to a window that ask me to view in marketplace app. Open app?  I try and nothing happens. I don't need marketplace but it this the main reason I access Facebook. I'll try a few more days if the problem continues I'll delete Facebook off my phone unable to find a different way to access marketplace. Thanks.

Glitch city Tired of attempting to write a comment or respond to comment or article and my screen goes blank and back to my main menu; also the constant refreshing stops me from scrolling down. Haven‚Äôt had any issues until the latest update and it‚Äôs almost a waste to go on Facebook at this point. These glitches need to be fixed.

As crappy as if written for a captive audience. Edit: finally just deleted this crap. The weekly 300mb updates ended up being the final straw. Dear Facebook why do you need that much space weekly? No privacy, no user friendliness, and makes itself annoying and intrusive.

Good stuff Hey FB, I would like for you guys to send out a notice b4 update just letting us know what to expect. Just a little note/post stating what we will see new and what we will no longer see. That‚Äôs a great heads up.
Nonexistent Notifications The app is generally okay.

Fix your update PLEASE So Facebook app was updated and there are too many issues to name. Not just me, everyone has these issues. I can‚Äôt see my post after I post it or look at a notification for it, it‚Äôll just show my name with nothing there even though other people can see the post. So then I don‚Äôt know what people are responding to. Also, it‚Äôll show I have notifications when I don‚Äôt. It won‚Äôt let me scroll the whole newsfeed before cutting off. Messenger shows I have messages when I don‚Äôt (I looked in ever folder of the app). Just fix what you messed up, go backwards to what it was a couple weeks ago please.

FACEBOOK APP IS TRASH I‚Äôve been having problems with this Facebook app for weeks now. For Facebook to update numerous times a week i don‚Äôt see any progress. My timeline barely shows any recent status ... it mainly shows what was posted 16 hours ago, 8 hours ago or maybe even something from last week. Every time i refresh my timeline the same thing that was shown seconds ago pops up again. You all have to do better this this app because it‚Äôs starting to become frustrating. I already barley like using Safari because i don‚Äôt like Facebook website ...
unwanted notifications I continually get notifications telling me that someone shared a post or asking me if I‚Äôve seen a friend‚Äôs comment on another friend‚Äôs post.

Comments Having trouble with typing in the comments section. When I type the last letter and hit the space bar, it erases/back spaces the last letter. Not sure if it‚Äôs a problem with the Facebook update or latest iOS update, but it‚Äôs pretty annoying.

Privacy defaults, post feed error Post feed won‚Äôt load correctly occasionally, only a few at a time. Ruled out connectivity and my phone, so it must be the app. Had this problem a few times the last 6 months but it has gotten out of hand the past week. How about also notifying us when you update your privacy defaults? When I want people to see that I am available to talk, I would like a simply, manual, way to be online. But most of the time on Facebook, I am either reading or watching something and would like to not be bothered by people.

Marketplace needs fixing Facebook is arbitrarily taking the market place away from users and then says you should report it as a problem and give them screenshots but that does absolutely nothing that was the primary reason that I used Facebook.  It‚Äôs terrible that they just have robots answering repetitive inquiries and I can‚Äôt even update my notifications so I keep getting notifications that new items are available based on the search is that I set up but I can‚Äôt close to stop getting alerts but yet can‚Äôt access what those results are!  Absurd!

Glitch Galore I‚Äôm a part of a private group in Facebook that consists of 3 thousand people. Every Monday we host a live video and recently I‚Äôve noticed that every time I go onto this club, my screen goes black and force closes the app. This is really upsetting because this was how we spread out brand to our members. Facebook needs to stop ruining all the good features that made this app once great.

Frustrated!  What happened to Marketplace? The Facebook page says that it provides a place to buy and sell items. I used Marketplace regularly for well over a year but am unable to access it for the last 3 weeks or so. The icon appears on the bottom of the Facebook page but I only get the message ‚ÄúAn unexpected error occurred. Try again later.‚Äù  I have sent several messages to Facebook and no one has responded. Can someone please tell me what I need to do to be able to access Marketplace again? I have no updates and no apps that need to be opened.

Customer Service Is A Joke Been locked out of my account for months now and Facebook has not even hinted to why this happened. Tried changing my password... nothing. Tried sending a picture to ID me... nothing, they didn‚Äôt even bother to respond to say if the ID would work or not. Doesn‚Äôt ask me for my security questions or to identify friends. Now my account has been disabled and Facebook hasn‚Äôt even replied to my account appeal. I‚Äôm starting to wonder if they even have anyone for customer support, or if they just set the system to trash all account support requests and appeals. An absolute joke is what they are right now.

MARKETPLACE??? What happened to the marketplace? Why the first page is stuck with a few items i see the last few weeks??? Why my items don‚Äôt get ANY exposure at all? I used to post an item and have an instant 10-20 views and merely 200 views till the next day and now everything is stuck to 0 or 1????? I was kicked out of the MARKETPLACE for like 2 weeks (for an unknown to me reason), then suddenly, everything went back to normal, but my ability to post and sell stuff is gone! WHY? Is that because I have to pay for my items to show on the first page? Wow. Can someone explain me what is actually happening???

Personalized privacy features do not work The recent updates have removed any way to add people to the lists that I‚Äôve made and changed the feed so that everyone in the friends list can see posts.  I have lists for family only, and different organizations I‚Äôm involved in.  But that is no longer possible.

Keeps logging me out! I have used Facebook for years and love the app, I never Wright reviews unless I feel the need to. A few of my friends and I both are having the same problem. We will be using to app and everything will be all good then out of nowhere it logs me and my friends out saying that I‚Äôm temporarily locked out then it makes me go throw all these protection things then makes me make a knew password, at least 9 times a week if not more. At first I looked past it but know it‚Äôs plan ticking me off! Please fix this God awful problem or please help me stop this, I‚Äôm so close to saying F this and delete my page and not useing Facebook

Cripples your iPhone‚Äôs Performance This app is the single biggest app that slows my iPhone now considerably as well as crashing frequently. If I remove the app my iPhone runs snappy. If I use this app it frequently makes my phone much slower than normal. The programmers seem to care most about cramming features into this ungainly bloated app and don‚Äôt care if it harms your phone‚Äôs performance and stability. I‚Äôm an experienced electronics and IT tech and so I like to keep my iPhone in peak health. As it is I‚Äôm ready to delete the Facebook app so my phone‚Äôs performance can be normal instead of dragged down by this app.

Makes relationships shallow There's nothing really wrong with the app except that I think Facebook is probably one of the worst things that could ever have happened to our society. We walk around like drones glued to our phones watching other people's lives through an app. Go outside, have real friendships, don't miss out on life! I purposely removed the app from my phone so I could do this, I was spending way too much time staring at my phone waiting for others to like my post. There's some good things about it, no doubt, but I think the cons out weigh the pros. I only download it sometimes to post pictures to encourage others to go outside!

Never again will I update anything. If I'm asked to update again. I will not do it. I've been trying to download Facebook after it failed to update, two, almost three days ago. I've done everything support ask me to do and it still doesn't work. I pray y'all are not using data every time this failed to download. Even thou I have unlimited by Verizon, so they claim. Maybe one day it will download. I don't keep my apps open, unless I'm using them. Which isn't often. But it would be nice to get on when I got ready. Thanks. Your service is great when it's working.

Latest update cause camera to open randomly After the last update (or the one before) my camera started opening randomly while typing or so other things on my IPhone 6plus. I deleted Facebook app and reinstalled, but the problem continued after allowing FB camera access. When I did it again and disallowed FB camera access, the problem has not reoccurred. Please fix this in the next update!!

Why are you trying to control everything? Since your last update I can't see my family post unless I search there name under Friends.  Facebook I would really like to have control on what I see when I log in.

Hate the recent update With the recent update, my notifications were moved to the upper left hand corner of the screen to make room for new features at the bottom. The new location would be fine if the notification button responded to touch. It only works about 30% of the time which is beyond frustrating. And no, it's not my phone since the screen responds to everything else. Move notifications or fix the glitch that makes the button not respond!

Where the hell are my notifications?? Really wish y'all would stop changing stuff... can't find anything on a group page, now I'm not getting my notifications. I have a business to run and this isn't helping! Yeah the gifs are cool and the Harry Potter things is cute but this has been a very frustrating couple of days.

Rage quits The recent update ( as of 8 hours ago for me ) causes my app to randomly shut down when I‚Äôm in the middle of watching a video or reading something. It seems to only happen to linger videos. Ones that are more than a 30 seconds long, but it‚Äôs annoying. Even when I go back in and try to watch the video again it shuts down around the same spot. At first i thought it was just the video, but now that‚Äôs its happened multiple times and I know the app was updated within the last few hours, I know it‚Äôs the update. Please fix. Thanks.

Please add this button... When I click on something with hundreds of thousands of comments, I want to be able to click a button that says "See Top Comment" so that I don't have to click "See More" and scroll 5,000 times. There's an option to see the new comments people are typing at the bottom, but I'd rather see the witty comments at the top with tons of likes. The app would be even better with that option.

Selective Loading The app only loads content about 2/3 of the time. Want to watch your friends stories? Forget about it. You get one or two but most never load. There is just a black screen that never loads anything. Try disconnecting your WiFi to only use cellular‚Äîsame thing. Try turning off cellular and only using WiFi‚Äîsame thing. Also, why can‚Äôt I just use this app to see my messages? FFS... two apps? Really? Maybe just limit functionality in the Facebook app, but it is ludicrous to not be able to view and respond with basic text on an app that already supports the same thing and so much more.

Checking group posts is a hassle For some inexplicable reason any time there is a comment made to a post in a group the notification only goes to that group, not the actual post.  In smaller groups it‚Äôs easy enough to find the post, but in larger posts with hundreds of posts a day it‚Äôs extremely frustrating to sift through and find the post you were following/commenting on. I‚Äôm not sure when it changed to doing this, but it has made my experience worse.

impersonating myself??? I have tried to create a facebook and successfully did about a month ago. Since then I have been asked to identify myself at least three times and facebook has suspended my account on various occasions until I send in a video of myself or my driver‚Äôs license. I am disappointed because as someone who has never used facebook prior I have used it a total of three days since the time I have created one. All I made it for was for the intention to join my college facebook group to find a roommate and I can‚Äôt even do that.

Inefficient for running business page Everything on the app runs smoothly for me my only complaint is that the options for running the business page are really limited and it can be very inconvenient. There is no option to schedule posts ahead of time and you can‚Äôt make a post and then save it as a draft to share later. On my computer I always use the publishing tools but they‚Äôre not available on my phone and is annoying. Once these options become available on the app I will give it 5 stars :)

Ads attached to everything. Feels Spammy. I understand that ads are necessary. In the videos that are being sponsored, but now, even when you tap a gif, to the right of it is a hidden ad, and when the gif itself opens beneath it the hidden ad opens a browserr and ad where it‚Äôs saying  ‚Äúyoure the winner‚Äù! and is basically spam. Facebook used to be really clean. Now it‚Äôs full of junk. I loved it for years and years because it connected me with relatives and friends far away. I didn‚Äôt want to be ungrateful for a platform that allowed us to share so much. But it‚Äôs way over the top now. These gif parasitic ads are ridiculous.

Landscape mode not working for live videos I‚Äôve been using this app to run 4 different business accounts for some time now and as of yesterday I was unable to rotate my camera into landscape mode for live videos. Every other app on my phone allows me to rotate (and no I do not have orientation lock on) and Facebook even allows me to watch other videos horizontally and take pictures/videos horizontally to post on my story but I am only having issues with the live feature. Please fix

Please Change The Following! I just bought an iPad 7th generation.  It is VERY IMPORTANT to me that when I get notifications about people commenting on my FB posts or other comments, that when i click on the notification, it TAKES ME DIRECTLY TO THE COMMENTS WITHIN THE SPECIFIC POST!  It is not.  When I click on the notification it takes me to the page and I am left to guess where that comment might be.  PLEASE FIX!!!  Also...VERY IMPORTANT:  PLEASE FIX THE FACT THAT I AM UNABLE TO USE MY SIMPLE EMOJIS IN A FACEBOOK POST!  I can use Emoji in FB Msg but not in a post and its very important so please please please fix!  If you do this I will give 5 stars Thank you.

Continue watching on Facebook watch I don‚Äôt really enjoy this feature on Instagram for IGTV. I sure as heck don‚Äôt want to jump away from my Facebook feed to finish watching a video. I‚Äôm hard of hearing and I‚Äôve gotta keep my phone on silent at work so there‚Äôs no point in me clicking on a video where the sound is gonna run and it takes away from smooth consistent scrolling. Also, a friend posted a video today and the ‚Äúcontinue watching on watch‚Äù popped up and there was 2 seconds left in the video. It‚Äôs annoying and not helpful. Maybe consider giving people the option to turn the FBTV option off and on.

Private groups I am so angry! I made a PRIVATE group for a surprise party. I didn‚Äôt know it was set up to be VISIBLE to anyone automatically! It should be automatically INVISIBLE to everyone not invited. That‚Äôs the whole pint of choosing private!!! Facebook sent a ‚Äúpages you may be interested in‚Äù post to my mom about her SECRET anniversary party! How annoying that a dang computer ruined the surprise (rather than a human-which I half way expected) because for some reason Facebook people think private groups should be visible to everyone. üò§ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è stupid!

Zero Support, Only ‚ÄúFeedback‚Äù I manage several Pages on Facebook. Recently, I can only comment on my businesses‚Äô page attributed as *another* page.  On the app only.  Personal computer is fine, but defeats the purpose of offering an app for ease of use. I tried reporting the problem hoping to get some support and when I submitted, the response was ‚Äúthanks for your feedback‚Äù.   I tried submitting a report for the mobile app and was responded with a message that is currently unavailable to use.  There is no means of getting actual support on Facebook.  For a platform with this many users and businesses, that‚Äôs ridiculous.

I‚Äôd rate Facebook a zero Can we talk on how you should make Facebook great again! All these problems with the site and all the rules getting people‚Äôs accounts blocked for no reason!! Or don‚Äôt tell them how long, or why. You even block people for long periods of time when some people use the site for business and there jobs! To communicate to their long lost family and kids and vent to people.! Everybody is saying it mark make Facebook great again or will we start a strike and make our own and better site!! (Hopefully the creator will fix the problem before we make an New and improved better website!!)

App is broken Notifications aren‚Äôt clearing when you go into the app and press on the notification button. When you pull down to refresh it just spins. And typing this won‚Äôt wrap so it‚Äôs impossible to see the full post. Freezes, closes and news feed is out of date

No notifications FB is garbage Why can they not make a decent app for the iPhone? I have not received any notifications on stuff I post for 2 months now, if I want to see if anyone has commented or liked I have to go look at my page. No way to change settings either. Constantly freezes and the list goes on!! So unhappy, with all the revenue they get from charging pages now they should really pay someone to create a decent working app! I wish it was like the beginning of FB where you saw your friends instead of nothing but ads and crap I don‚Äôt care about. Social media is not what FB represents any longer.

News feed It never works scroll through then won‚Äôt go any further. I have threaten to shut it down and move to a Instagram but at this point facebook is leaving me no choice. With every latest greatest update it‚Äôs a disaster what happened to the good all days of Facebook they have ruined it. Also in the last time I updated the way it sort your friends is ridiculous. Going to transition my family and friends that I regularly correspond with over to Instagram. You report the problem to them and all they do is give you a big thumbs up there appreciate my feedback but they do nothing to resolve it.

Note to Developers New Reaction Button Speed The animation on the new reaction buttons looks great, but the extra millisecond it takes to complete the function is maddening. It‚Äôs not worth the bells and whistles of your slowing functionality down. Maybe a little less animation would speed it up, but it appears that you‚Äôre lessening the quality for something that really doesn‚Äôt improve user experience.

Why do you keep making it worse? I used to be able to edit my timeline posts to most recent.   Now when I use the most recent choice on menu, I get a bit of everything but most of it is stuff I‚Äôve never seen from 2-3 days ago, or even a week!

Bias As much as I love Facebook I am increasingly getting tired of the bias against Republicans. The liberals can say and post the most racist, hateful, filthy language things and don‚Äôt get put in Facebook jail. Yet we can state the truth and get put in jail for the littlest things. I just got put in for agreeing with someone else‚Äôs post! Nothing racist, nor offensive, not hate, none of the things they have listed. Our Freedom of speech is being taken away.

New Glitch - end of August ‚Äò19 Update So now - in addition to notifications of Group activity not taking me to the specific post or comment - when I get an invitation to Like a Page or join a Group it does not take me to the Page or Group. It takes me to ‚ÄúPending Notifications‚Äù none of which have anything to do with what I‚Äôm being invited to look at or join. THE ONLY WAY I can respond to these requests/invites are when I‚Äôm on the desktop website.

Issues I‚Äôm running a small business through a Facebook Group. For the last 3 days none of my customers can see my product posts or any photos within the group! Facebook is getting your entire device name as well as your device id (IDFA) FYI having worked in this industry i can say it‚Äôs easy to get full real names of people because their device name is often their first and last name.  Using this to map to their advertising identifier de anonymizes all adtech for these unfortunate users making it easy to get very detailed granular data about a user and their activity.  So if you are going to use Facebook on iOS at least make sure your device name is not your real name and consider turning off IDFA.
